name: Sum #1
description:
PUZZLE #1. SUM

Assignment:

Write a function named `sum` which performs addition in the way shown below

```javascript
sum(4)(5)(9)(); // => 18
sum(5)();       // => 5
sum();          // => 0
```
```ruby
sum(4).(5).(9).()  #=> 18
sum(5).()          #=> 5
sum()              #=> 0

NOTE: Pay attention that last brackets are left empty to indicate end of operations

Thanks to @JohanWiltink, @donaldsebleung
